When your target doesn’t know you’re armed, you can strike out before they even know what hit them.

Prerequisites: Sleight of Hand 5 ranks

Benefit: When you draw a hidden one-handed melee weapon with light bulk, you can attempt to do so secretly with a @Check[type:sleight-of-hand] opposed by your target’s Perception. If you succeed, your target is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{flat-footed} against the next attack made with that weapon. If you do not attack immediately, your opponent receives an additional Perception check at the start of each of their turns against your original Sleight of Hand result with a +2 bonus. If they succeed, you lose any advantage granted by this feat.
